#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll h[200001];
ll dp[200001];
int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin >> n;
    for(ll i = 0; i < n; i++){
        cin >> h[i];
    }
    for(ll i = 0; i < n; i++) dp[i] = LONG_LONG_MAX;
    dp[0] = 0;
    for(ll i = 0; i < n; i++){
        for(ll j = 1; i - j >= 0 ; j<<=1){
            dp[i] = min(dp[i],dp[i-j] + abs(h[i] - h[i-j]));
        }
    }
    cout << dp[n-1] << endl;
}
